definition: "ice" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 15), occurring in 冰[bing1], 次[ci4] etc, known as 兩點水|两点水[liang3 dian3 shui3]

road condition(s) (e.g. surface, traffic flow etc)

sentences.english: Only in the respiratory status of life between the breath does not come, things go much to suffer.
